mapper.select: SELECT /* cslIsp.getCslIspList */ CI.ISP_DT , CI.MBR_NO , CI.MNG_TP_CD , SC.CD_NM AS MNG_TP_NM , CI.ISP_RST , CI.CRE_ID , SU.USR_NM AS CRE_NM FROM CSL_ISP CI LEFT JOIN SYS_USR SU ON (CI.CRE_ID = SU.USR_ID) LEFT JOIN SYS_CD SC ON (SC.GRP_CD = 'C4200' AND CI.MNG_TP_CD = SC.CD_ID) WHERE CI.MBR_NO = #{mbrNo} ORDER BY CI.CRE_DT DESC

SELECT /* cslIsp.getCslIspInfo */ A.* , CAST(AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(MM.MBR_NM), #{paswKey}) AS CHAR) AS MBR_NM , SC01.CD_NM AS GEND_NM , MM.AGE , MM.REG_DT , SC02.CD_NM AS MEDIC_CARE_NM , SC03.CD_NM AS STS_NM , SC04.CD_NM AS JOB_NM , SC05.CD_NM AS SITE_NM , SU2.USR_NM AS MNG_USR_NM FROM ( SELECT CI.ISP_DT , CI.MBR_NO , CI.LINK_CD , CI.MNG_TP_CD , SC.CD_NM AS MNG_TP_NM , IFNULL(CI.EVL_ITM_SCO01, '0') AS EVL_ITM_SCO01 , IFNULL(CI.EVL_ITM_SCO02, '0') AS EVL_ITM_SCO02 , IFNULL(CI.EVL_ITM_SCO03, '0') AS EVL_ITM_SCO03 , IFNULL(CI.EVL_ITM_SCO04, '0') AS EVL_ITM_SCO04 , IFNULL(CI.EVL_ITM_SCO05, '0') AS EVL_ITM_SCO05 , IFNULL(CI.EVL_ITM_SCO06, '0') AS EVL_ITM_SCO06 , IFNULL(CI.EVL_ITM_SCO07, '0') AS EVL_ITM_SCO07 , IFNULL(CI.EVL_ITM_SCO08, '0') AS EVL_ITM_SCO08 , IFNULL(CI.EVL_ITM_SCO09, '0') AS EVL_ITM_SCO09 , IFNULL(CI.EVL_ITM_SCO10, '0') AS EVL_ITM_SCO10 , IFNULL(CI.EVL_ITM_SCO11, '0') AS EVL_ITM_SCO11 , IFNULL(CI.EVL_ITM_SCO12, '0') AS EVL_ITM_SCO12 , IFNULL(CI.EVL_ITM_SCO13, '0') AS EVL_ITM_SCO13 , IFNULL(CI.EVL_ITM_SCO14, '1') AS EVL_ITM_SCO14 , IFNULL(CI.EVL_ITM_SCO15, '0') AS EVL_ITM_SCO15 , IFNULL(CI.EVL_ITM_SCO16, '0') AS EVL_ITM_SCO16 , IFNULL(CI.EVL_ITM_SCO17, '0') AS EVL_ITM_SCO17 , IFNULL(CI.EVL_ITM_SCO18, '0') AS EVL_ITM_SCO18 , IFNULL(CI.EVL_ITM_SCO19, '0') AS EVL_ITM_SCO19 , IFNULL(CI.EVL_ITM_SCO20, '0') AS EVL_ITM_SCO20 , IFNULL(CI.EVL_ITM_SCO21, '1') AS EVL_ITM_SCO21 , IFNULL(CI.EVL_ITM_SCO22, '1') AS EVL_ITM_SCO22 , IFNULL(CI.EVL_ITM_SCO23, '1') AS EVL_ITM_SCO23 , IFNULL(CI.EVL_ITM_SCO24, '1') AS EVL_ITM_SCO24 , IFNULL(CI.EVL_ITM_SCO25, '1') AS EVL_ITM_SCO25 , CI.EVL_ITM_LNK01 , CI.EVL_ITM_LNK02 , CI.EVL_ITM_LNK03 , CI.EVL_ITM_LNK04 , CI.EVL_ITM_LNK05 , CI.EVL_ITM_LNK06 , CI.EVL_ITM_LNK07 , CI.EVL_ITM_LNK08 , CI.EVL_ITM_LNK09 , CI.EVL_ITM_LNK10 , CI.EVL_ITM_LNK11 , CI.EVL_ITM_LNK12 , CI.EVL_ITM_LNK13 , CI.EVL_ITM_LNK14 , CI.EVL_ITM_LNK15 , CI.EVL_ITM_LNK16 , CI.EVL_ITM_LNK17 , CI.EVL_ITM_LNK18 , CI.EVL_ITM_LNK19 , CI.EVL_ITM_LNK20 , CI.EVL_ITM_LNK21 , CI.EVL_ITM_LNK22 , CI.EVL_ITM_LNK23 , CI.EVL_ITM_LNK24 , CI.EVL_ITM_LNK25 , CI.ISP_RST , CI.TGT_CTNT , CI.CRE_ID , CI.CRE_DT , CI.UPD_ID , CI.UPD_DT
, SC01.CD_NM AS EVL_ITM_SCO01_NM , SC02.CD_NM AS EVL_ITM_SCO02_NM , SC03.CD_NM AS EVL_ITM_SCO03_NM , SC04.CD_NM AS EVL_ITM_SCO04_NM , SC05.CD_NM AS EVL_ITM_SCO17_NM , SC06.CD_NM AS EVL_ITM_SCO06_NM , SC07.CD_NM AS EVL_ITM_SCO07_NM , SC08.CD_NM AS EVL_ITM_SCO08_NM , SC09.CD_NM AS EVL_ITM_SCO09_NM , SC10.CD_NM AS EVL_ITM_SCO18_NM , SC11.CD_NM AS EVL_ITM_SCO19_NM , SC12.CD_NM AS EVL_ITM_SCO10_NM , SC13.CD_NM AS EVL_ITM_SCO11_NM , SC14.CD_NM AS EVL_ITM_SCO20_NM , SC15.CD_NM AS EVL_ITM_SCO12_NM , SC16.CD_NM AS EVL_ITM_SCO13_NM , SC17.CD_NM AS EVL_ITM_SCO15_NM , SC18.CD_NM AS EVL_ITM_SCO16_NM , SC19.CD_NM AS EVL_ITM_SCO14_NM , SC20.CD_NM AS EVL_ITM_SCO21_NM , SC21.CD_NM AS EVL_ITM_SCO22_NM , SC22.CD_NM AS EVL_ITM_SCO23_NM , SC23.CD_NM AS EVL_ITM_SCO24_NM , SC24.CD_NM AS EVL_ITM_SCO25_NM FROM CSL_ISP CI LEFT JOIN SYS_CD SC ON (SC.GRP_CD = 'C4200' AND CI.MNG_TP_CD = SC.CD_ID) LEFT JOIN SYS_CD SC01 ON (SC01.GRP_CD = 'C5010' AND SC01.CD_ID = CI.EVL_ITM_SCO01) LEFT JOIN SYS_CD SC02 ON (SC02.GRP_CD = 'C5010' AND SC02.CD_ID = CI.EVL_ITM_SCO02) LEFT JOIN SYS_CD SC03 ON (SC03.GRP_CD = 'C5010' AND SC03.CD_ID = CI.EVL_ITM_SCO03) LEFT JOIN SYS_CD SC04 ON (SC04.GRP_CD = 'C5010' AND SC04.CD_ID = CI.EVL_ITM_SCO04) LEFT JOIN SYS_CD SC05 ON (SC05.GRP_CD = 'C5010' AND SC05.CD_ID = CI.EVL_ITM_SCO17) LEFT JOIN SYS_CD SC06 ON (SC06.GRP_CD = 'C5120' AND SC06.CD_ID = CI.EVL_ITM_SCO06) LEFT JOIN SYS_CD SC07 ON (SC07.GRP_CD = 'C5130' AND SC07.CD_ID = CI.EVL_ITM_SCO07) LEFT JOIN SYS_CD SC08 ON (SC08.GRP_CD = 'C5140' AND SC08.CD_ID = CI.EVL_ITM_SCO08) LEFT JOIN SYS_CD SC09 ON (SC09.GRP_CD = 'C5150' AND SC09.CD_ID = CI.EVL_ITM_SCO09) LEFT JOIN SYS_CD SC10 ON (SC10.GRP_CD = 'C5110' AND SC10.CD_ID = CI.EVL_ITM_SCO18) LEFT JOIN SYS_CD SC11 ON (SC11.GRP_CD = 'C5110' AND SC11.CD_ID = CI.EVL_ITM_SCO19) LEFT JOIN SYS_CD SC12 ON (SC12.GRP_CD = 'C5210' AND SC12.CD_ID = CI.EVL_ITM_SCO10) LEFT JOIN SYS_CD SC13 ON (SC13.GRP_CD = 'C5220' AND SC13.CD_ID = CI.EVL_ITM_SCO11) LEFT JOIN SYS_CD SC14 ON (SC14.GRP_CD = 'C5220' AND SC14.CD_ID = CI.EVL_ITM_SCO20) LEFT JOIN SYS_CD SC15 ON (SC15.GRP_CD = 'C5310' AND SC15.CD_ID = CI.EVL_ITM_SCO12) LEFT JOIN SYS_CD SC16 ON (SC16.GRP_CD = 'C5320' AND SC16.CD_ID = CI.EVL_ITM_SCO13) LEFT JOIN SYS_CD SC17 ON (SC17.GRP_CD = 'C5310' AND SC17.CD_ID = CI.EVL_ITM_SCO15) LEFT JOIN SYS_CD SC18 ON (SC18.GRP_CD = 'C5310' AND SC18.CD_ID = CI.EVL_ITM_SCO16) LEFT JOIN SYS_CD SC19 ON (SC19.GRP_CD = 'C7700' AND SC19.CD_ID = CI.EVL_ITM_SCO14) LEFT JOIN SYS_CD SC20 ON (SC20.GRP_CD = 'C7700' AND SC20.CD_ID = CI.EVL_ITM_SCO21) LEFT JOIN SYS_CD SC21 ON (SC21.GRP_CD = 'C7700' AND SC21.CD_ID = CI.EVL_ITM_SCO22) LEFT JOIN SYS_CD SC22 ON (SC22.GRP_CD = 'C7700' AND SC22.CD_ID = CI.EVL_ITM_SCO23) LEFT JOIN SYS_CD SC23 ON (SC23.GRP_CD = 'C7700' AND SC23.CD_ID = CI.EVL_ITM_SCO24) LEFT JOIN SYS_CD SC24 ON (SC24.GRP_CD = 'C7700' AND SC24.CD_ID = CI.EVL_ITM_SCO25) WHERE MBR_NO = #{mbrNo} AND ISP_DT = #{ispDt} ) A INNER JOIN MST_MBR MM ON MM.MBR_NO = A.MBR_NO LEFT JOIN SYS_USR SU2 ON (SU2.USR_ID = MM.MNG_USR_ID) LEFT JOIN SYS_CD SC01 ON (SC01.GRP_CD = 'C1100' AND SC01.CD_ID = MM.GEND_CD) LEFT JOIN SYS_CD SC02 ON (SC02.GRP_CD = 'C3100' AND SC02.CD_ID = MM.MEDIC_CARE_CD) LEFT JOIN SYS_CD SC03 ON (SC03.GRP_CD = 'C5500' AND SC03.CD_ID = MM.STS_CD) LEFT JOIN SYS_CD SC04 ON (SC04.GRP_CD = 'C1200' AND SC04.CD_ID = MM.JOB_CD ) LEFT JOIN SYS_CD SC05 ON (SC05.GRP_CD = 'C3500' AND SC05.CD_ID = SU2.SITE_CD)
